sense.gloss: to bring in, to take in, to carry in
to approach (someone) with (a proposal, offer, problem, etc.), to bring, to lodge (a complaint), to propose (e.g. a project)
to bring (to another stage), to take (e.g. to court, to extra time, to a play-off)

sdata.j: ↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓は↑一定↑↓いってい↓↑量↑↓りょう↓の↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓を↑機内↑↓きない↓に↑持↑↓|も↓ち↑込↑↓こ↓む|ことができる。
sdata.e: Passengers can take a certain amount of baggage on the airplane.
